title: DurationValidator
description: A validator specifying the constraints on a duration.

type.$comment:
This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.
It is extended with the titles of all descendant types during
the generation of schema.json files.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

timeUnits.description: The time units that the duration can have.
timeUnits.$comment: A duration is valid if its `timeUnit` is amongst the `timeUnits` of the validator.

minimum.description: The inclusive lower limit for a duration.
minimum.$comment: A duration is valid if it is greater than, or exactly equal to, `minimum`.

maximum.description: The inclusive upper limit for a duration.
maximum.$comment: A duration is valid if it is less than, or exactly equal to, `maximum`.
